formDataStructure.label: SECTION II - PERFORMANCE SUMMARY AND RATING

children.label: List each element in the performance plan; indicate whether it is critical/non critical and what weight has been assigned to it.
Assign a rating level for each element. (5) Outstanding, (4) Commendable, (3) Fully Successful, (2) Marginal/Minimal Satisfactory (SES), (1) Unacceptable/Unsatisfactory (SES)
Score each element by multiplying the weight by the rating level
After each element has been scored, compute the total score by summing all individual scores. Total score can range from 100 to 500

formDataStructure.label: For SES: Turn to reverse side and continue with Item 3
Examining Related Hours Credited For Award Purposes
If the award period is less than full period (i.e., less than 4 full quarters for SAA), indicate reason below

fields.label: Note: If only requesting a change in schedule/hours, please only complete this section, the Schedule Information section and the Daily Schedule section.
Note: Requested Start Date should be the first Sunday of a bi-week and End Date will be the end of the current term
I am requesting participation in the Part-Time Program under the:
(Has child who has not yet begun first grade)
(Has child in school who has not yet turned age 16)
(Has an elderly relative; including parent/grandparent, in-laws or equivalent relationships; who requires care)
(MUST meet CSRS or FERS minimum retirement eligibility requirements)
(Managements Discretion on a case by case basis)
Note for New Applicants: Requested start date is usually the first Sunday of a bi-week
Note for Renewing Participants: Requested start date should be the day after your current term ends
Note: At the end of the term, participant will revert to full-time status or may reapply
Note: Must separately apply and be eligible for these programs
Indicate the number of hours to be worked and the day on which they will be worked
* Must work at least 2 days and 16 hours per week (M-F)
* May only work 4-10 regular hours per day
* At least one core day (Tues or Thurs) must be worked each week between 12pm - 2pm

Supervisors acknowledgement that the employee meets the eligibility requirements to request enrollment or renewal in a part-time program component. Employee does not have to meet eligibility requirements for Hardship Situations or when only requesting a change in schedule/hours.

Note: Applicants should ensure that their request forms are received by the Program Administrator no less than two (2) weeks prior to the requested start date. Applicants will be notified if their request has been approved or, if no current slot is available, that they have been placed on a wait list.
Comments
fields.value: I have read all of the terms and conditions
